content: Create a limerick where all words start with the letter "w".

What a wonderful world, where whimsical wonders weave their way. Witty words, woven with wisdom, whispering in the wind's welcome. Wistful wanderers, walking westward, watching the world's wonders unfold. WARRANTED WARNING: Please note, this content is purely for entertainment and should not be taken seriously. If you have any concerns, please contact your administrator.
